original_title: US push to build naval drone fleet ‘not going well’ – Reuters — RT World News
article_summary: US imposes 10% surcharge on weapons sold to Europe for Ukraine, with potential funds to cover air support costs for Kiev, according to Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent. Meanwhile, Bolivian President Luis Arce accuses the US of using the 'drug war' as a pretext for political and economic domination in Latin America.</s>
